definitions: When you cannot recall what, or who, you did while on vacation without your significant other.
Completely cutting off all communication with a person you shared a romantic encounter with while on vacation.

V.definition: A sex toy used in BDSM, bondage play, and by latex fetishists. A person is vacuum-sealed in one of these latex beds or cubes, leaving them breathing through a tube and completely unable to see, hear, or move.
Latin for toothed vagina.
V.origins: From various folktales and urban legends originally used to discourage men from forcing women to have sex or from having sex with foreign women.
